The cor anglais or English horn in North America, is a double-reed woodwind 
instrument in the oboe family. It is approximately one and a half times the length 
of an oboe. ... The term cor anglais is French for English horn, but the instrument 
is neither from England nor related to the various conical-bore brass instruments
...
